thread.title: MedGenome raises $20mm in Series B funding
thread.title_full: MedGenome raises $20mm in Series B funding

title: MedGenome raises $20mm in Series B funding
text:
MedGenome raises $20mm in Series B funding Deal Date: Jul-01-2015 / Deal # 201530581 Executive Summary 
Indian genomics company MedGenome Labs Pvt. Ltd. raised $20mm from Sequoia Capital in its Series B financing round. The company will use the funds to further invest in its bioinformatics infrastructure, to enhance its sequencing facilities in India and in the US, and to expand its research and scientific teams. Abhay Pandey of Sequoia will join the board of the company.
